name: StoryOfShiba
description:
Entry for The DogeCoinGameJam 2021

How much dogecoin are you able to get your hands on?!

A (still very WIP) game for the first Dogecoin gamejam, this represents a lot of time and effort over a period of 7 days to make a very Banjo-Kazooie inspired adventure/platformer, based on 90s N64/PSX style limited graphics! 

Story of Shiba ended up being more of a demo than a full game experience, but I hope people still enjoy getting into it! Any and all feedback welcome. 

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/Alex_ADEdge

I dont take payment for any of my games, but if youre feeling generous Shiba vibes then this is my Dogecoin wallet! DS6jJCrCctoDEp4haj52c8pgPJDLy3G2KJ 

*Note, Ive fixed one pretty big bug in the game with the dialogue & tutorial system that stops you from being able to learn how to jump. That was a painful one to work out. Theres no way to restart (so if you get stuck & things break youll have to hit refesh). But it should be a lot better now.
